DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure colloid osmotic pressure in interstitial fluid and plasma in healthy children under two years, in asphyxiated babies and in children undergoing heart surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Measurements of Colloid Osmotic Pressure in Interstitial Fluid and Plasma in Healthy and Sick Children
DOC.keyword: Colloid Osmotic pressure in interstitial fluid
